surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

pinyin: Ma3 da2 jia1 si1 jia1 Dao3

sentences.english: A young boy descends into a saphire mine in southern Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 一個小男孩下到馬達加斯加南部的一個藍寶石礦裏。

sentences.english: Madagascar's limestone towers are a haven for strange species.
sentences.chinese: 馬達加斯加的那些石灰石塔是奇異物種的天堂。

sentences.english: Light permeates the sheer petals of a Madagascar periwinkle.
sentences.chinese: 燈光透過了一朵馬達加斯加長春花的纖薄的花瓣。

sentences.english: Light permeates the sheer petals of a Madagascar periwinkle.
sentences.chinese: 陽光滲透過馬達加斯加長春花的花瓣邊緣。

sentences.english: Madagascar is a trove of the wondrous.
sentences.chinese: 馬達加斯加是一個讓人驚歎的藏寶之島。

sentences.english: Growth in Madagascar's lemurs are afraid of cold, they can not do without the sun.
sentences.chinese: 生長在馬達加斯加的狐猴很怕冷，他們不能沒有太陽。

sentences.english: Madagascar's ring-tailed lemur in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 馬達加斯加的環尾狐猴在野外。

sentences.english: The dancing lemur (Verreaux's sifaka) lives on the island of Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 善於跳舞的狐猴生活在馬達加斯加島上。

sentences.english: Soldiers had seized the building a few hours before.
sentences.chinese: 馬達加斯加軍人一度佔領這座總統府幾個小時。

sentences.english: The giant leaf-tailed gecko lives in Montagne d'Anjanaharibe, Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 巨型葉尾壁虎棲息於馬達加斯加島的蒙塔格尼。

sentences.english: Madagascar's government was just overthrown in a coup this past week.
sentences.chinese: 馬達加斯加的政府在上週也被暴動推翻。

sentences.english: China ranked near the bottom, barely higher than last-place Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 中國差一點墊底，只排在倒數第一馬達加斯加前面。

sentences.english: The national tree of Madagascar the baobab can attain a trunk diameter of 36 feet.
sentences.chinese: 馬達加斯加的國樹，主幹直徑能達到36英尺。

sentences.english: Aye- ayes can be found only on the island of Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 狐猴只生活在馬達加斯加島上。

sentences.english: Madagascar is one of the countries endorsed by the Education for All Fast Track Initiative (EFA FTI).
sentences.chinese: 馬達加斯加是普及教育快速道動議接納的國家之一。

sentences.english: The vanilla is a strategic product for Malagasy economy.
sentences.chinese: 香草是馬達加斯加人的一種戰略經濟作物。

definition: Kenya (Tw) (written as 肯尼亞|肯尼亚 in PRC)
abbr. for 北愛爾蘭|北爱尔兰[Bei3 Ai4 er3 lan2], Northern Ireland

definition: to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)
